DOC.brief_summary: The USAGE study aims at assessing on a long-term period (two years in average) the outcome in clinical or economical term of patients with knee osteoarthritis (OA) treated or not with Synvisc®, in the 1139.4 clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Synvisc® in Knee Osteoarthritis - Medico-economical Study
DOC.criteria: Patients have already been followed up on a ninemonth period in a pragmatic medicaeconomical clinical trial (BI Trial No.: 1139.4)
